solution_line_template: Each small piece is {length_per_piece} inches because {total_rope_length} / {num_pieces} = <<{total_rope_length}/{num_pieces}={length_per_piece}>>{length_per_piece}.

Each piece is then {length_after_knots} inches long after the knots are tied because {length_per_piece}-{knot_shortening}=<<{length_per_piece}-{knot_shortening}={length_after_knots}>>{length_after_knots}

The three pieces tied together are now {total_length_tied_pieces} inches long because {length_after_knots} x {num_pieces_tied} = <<{length_after_knots}*{num_pieces_tied}={total_length_tied_pieces}>>{total_length_tied_pieces}
